name: VagusNerveStimulationVNSImplantation
title: Vagus Nerve Stimulation (VNS) Implantation
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent clinical concepts related to Vagus Nerve Stimulation (VNS) Implantation. This surgical procedure involves implanting a device that delivers electrical stimulation to the vagus nerve, primarily for managing treatment resistant epilepsy and depression.),(Data Element Scope: The value set includes concepts pertaining to procedural techniques, device specifications, and relevant clinical indications.),(Inclusion Criteria: Indications: 
(1) Patients with refractory epilepsy whose condition cannot be controlled by anti-epileptic drugs and whose condition cannot be improved by resection surgery or who have failed resection surgery.
(2) Definition of patients with refractory epilepsy: patients who have taken or have taken two or more anti-epileptic drugs with indications and in effective doses for at least one year and still cannot control seizures.),(Exclusion Criteria: No)
